body.name: Acer Nitro KG241Y Sbiip 23.8” Full HD (1920 x 1080) VA Gaming Monitor | AMD FreeSync Premium Technology | 165Hz Refresh Rate | 1ms (VRB) | ZeroFrame Design | 1 x Display Port 1.2 & 2 x HDMI 2.0,Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 22 mins
features: Refresh Rate: 165Hz | Response Time: 1ms (VRB) | Pixel Pitch: 0.275mm | Color Saturation: NTSC 72%
VESA mounting compliant (100 x 100mm) | Ergonomic Tilt: -5° to 15°
Ports: 1 x Display Port 1.2 and 2 x HDMI 2.0 (HDMI Cable Included)
body.description: In competitive gaming, every frame matters. Introducing Acer's KG241Y gaming monitor - the Full HD (1920 x 1080) resolution monitor that can keep up with your game play. Through AMD FreeSync Premium technology, the game’s frame rate is determined by your graphics card, not the fixed refresh rate of the monitor, giving you a serious competitive edge. Plus, users can enjoy comfortable viewing experience while gaming via flicker-less, low dimming and ComfyView display. The design saves space on your desk and lets you place multiple monitors side by side to build a seamless big-screen display. (UM.QX1AA.S01)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Quality Visuals Crisp, true-to-life colors come alive in Full HD resolution. Movies and games appear more real and dramatic, and small details and text are clear with 1920 x 1080 resolution in a 16:9 aspect ratio.

Rapid Refresh Rate The 165Hz refresh rate speeds up the frames per second to deliver an ultra-smooth 2D motion scenes. With a rapid refresh rate of 165Hz, Acer Monitors shorten the time it takes for frame rendering, lower input lag and provide gamers an excellent in-game experience

No Screen Tearing Say “goodbye” to stuttering and tearing. With AMD FreeSync Premium, the monitor’s frames are synced with the graphics card’s frames, which eliminates screen tearing and provide the smoothest gaming experience.

Goodbye Ghosting Fast response time of 1ms enhanced gamers’ in-game experience. No matter the fast-moving action or any dramatic transitions will be all rendered smoothly without the annoying effects of smearing or ghosting.

Features HDR Ready HDR is a display technology that creates deeper levels of black and white contrast, giving you a greater level immersion through realistic image recreation. Acer HDR displays support HDR10 format. Multiple Gaming Modes Take your pick from a wide variety of gaming and non-gaming modes, each with its own unique color profile. Choose from action, racing, sports, and more! Customize all your apps to automatically run in the mode you prefer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good for the value.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this monitor, and I must say that I am thoroughly impressed with its performance. One of its standout features is the impressive 165Hz refresh rate, as advertised. This high refresh rate contributes significantly to the overall smoothness of the display, providing a delightful gaming and viewing experience.The build quality of the monitor is another aspect that caught my attention. It doesn't feel cheap or flimsy and instead, it exudes a sense of sturdiness and durability. The design is sleek and modern, adding an aesthetic appeal to my setup. The attention to detail in the construction is evident, making it a visually pleasing addition to any desk.One feature that truly enhances the visual experience is the HDR capability. I found the HDR performance to be excellent, both in games and while watching movies. The colors are vibrant, and the contrast is impressive, adding depth and realism to the content. This feature significantly enhances the overall viewing pleasure, making it a great choice for multimedia enthusiasts.In terms of gaming, the combination of the high refresh rate and HDR support makes this monitor a fantastic choice for gaming enthusiasts. Fast-paced games feel incredibly smooth, and the improved color reproduction adds to the immersive gaming experience. I appreciate the attention given to creating a monitor that not only meets but exceeds expectations when it comes to gaming performance.Considering the performance and features offered, the price of this monitor is quite reasonable. It strikes a good balance between affordability and high-end features, making it a cost-effective choice for users who want a top-notch display without breaking the bank. I would confidently recommend this monitor to anyone looking for a reliable and feature-rich display at an affordable price point.To sum up, the 165Hz refresh rate, robust build quality, impressive HDR performance, and reasonable pricing make this monitor a standout option in its category. It has certainly exceeded my expectations, and I am thoroughly satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality for Cheap Price
reviews.reviewText: I bought two and have had them for about a month now. They are honestly really good quality for the low price point, making me wish I would’ve bought three of these instead of a $250 LG monitor. The video quality is very smooth and displays anything I need with great performance. 100% with the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent VA monitor and great for my eyes
reviews.reviewText: I get eye strain and blurry vision from using IPS monitors, and decided to go back to VA monitors as I didn't have eye strain issues when using VA monitors from the past. This VA monitor is excellent with 240hz refresh rate. There is no ghosting at all. Excellent color and viewing angle. It has all the benefits of IPS but without the eye strain issue. You can't tell if this is a VA monitor. I tried several other VA monitors, including many that claim to have eye health features for eye strain but most of them are just marketing gimmick. If you get eye strain from IPS monitor, give this a monitor a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Monitor, Horrible Factory Settings.
reviews.reviewText: For 120$ this is a pretty solid monitor, 180hz, 1ms response time, decent build quality, etc. But it has TERRIBLE factory settings (brightness way too low, awful ghosting) you can fix it in the osd by turning up the black boost to 10 (this will result in slightly worse colors but i think its worth it) and turning on freesync (if you have an amd card) or turning the pixel drive to extreme if you have a nivida card. Overall i have little complaints other then that and its a pretty budget friendly monitor but i would recommend getting the ips version of this monitor (last time i checked it was cheaper then this one with the same specs) if you can't stand semi noticeable ghosting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent! I use as a monitor for my laptop. Works very well and looks nice too. Does not take up much space on my desk. Resolution and colors are great. Seems to handle motion very well. Colors look natural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for gaming
reviews.reviewText: Very slick looking monitor, I love the red stand. It’s the perfect size for sitting at a desk while gaming. Good graphics and response time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for portrait/vertical view!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been meaning to do this for awhile, and was just looking for a decent monitor next to my curved 34”.I came across this, and the price is actually pretty gnarly for the refresh rate and size.What I like about this is that it goes up to 180hz and the colors are decently well!I’m using this for my coding. I would highly recommend, even if it’s just going to be your main monitor for a budget friendly setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would be great but screen is defective
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Update 2: new screen has worked great! Replacement process when they picked up was very easy!UPDATE: When I went directly to Amazon Customer support instead of trying to do it through my orders I was able to do a much easier return, they'll even pick it up! I'll add a new update after I receive the replacement!5/26/23 I am so disappointed it arrived today and I was so excited to set it up, I needed this monitor ASAP for school and now because there are clearly damaged pixels or something I'm going to need to return this. However, the return process is such a headache as it will not just give me an option to return the monitor and simply have a replacement sent, I need to drive 30 miles to the nearest return location and then wait till they receive it, test it apparently, wait till my bank issues the funds back to me and then order it over again and wait for them to mail a new one and hope that it's not also defective. I would just put up with the weird shadows but I'm concerned that the rest of the screen will go because of whatever damage caused this. If not for the screen I believe I would be happy with this purchase, but considering it doesn't have speakers or anything BUT a screen that's kinda a crucial feature.

Es un producto bastante bueno por su gran tasa de refrescos 140 hz es una batalla bastante buena para adentrarse al gaming está pantalla va bastante fluida a la hora de ver contenido o jugar videojuegos la recomiendo bastante es muy buen producto

reviews.reviewTitle: No existe ningun monitor a mejor calidad/precio a 250hz!
reviews.reviewText: Hasta ahorita excelente! Lo unico que se tiene que tomar en cuenta es que esta muy escaso y con Prime duro 3 semanas en llegar :/

Este monitor lo compre porque estaba buscando una actualización de Hardware, anteriormente tenia un monitor senseye 3 led benq, y la verdad el cambio de imagen es drástico, la tasa de respuesta en juegos es por mucho mejor, el brillo y colores son mas vivos en este monitor. De noche los negros permanecen en negros por lo que si buscas un monitor para jugar con la luz apagada este es una buena opción, el rango de visión es muy bueno. El tamaño no es un problema para mi porque mi escritorio es grande, pero si tienes un escritorio pequeño tal vez te cueste acostumbrarte al tamaño, sobre todo si tenias anteriormente algo por debajo del tamaño de este. En cuanto al rendimiento no he notado problemas, llevo usándolo casi 3 meses y no me ha fallado nada. El embalaje fue muy bueno, llego sin ningún daño y perfectamente nuevo y sellado.
Tiene buen tamaño y hasta ahorita me a funcionado bien , la probé jugando con el xbox y tiene buena resolución
I don't think the neck is so sturdy. Whenever I try to move it, it feels like it's loose. However, it won't fall unless you force it to.
